bibl.seg: PARKER Grant, The Making of Roman India. (Greek Culture in the Roman World.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2008, 8°, xv-357 pp., 11 figg., 3 cartes. ISBN 978-0-521-85834-2. £55.
